Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Royce Clayton
Dear Sir,
Royce Clayton has an AVG of .289 at AA Havana Blast!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Chris James
Dear Sir,
Chris James has nothing more to prove at A Helena Handbaskets!
He has an AVG of .357 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Rico Rossy
Dear Sir,
Rico Rossy has an AVG of .239 at AA Havana Blast!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Jose Gonzalez
Dear Sir,
Jose Gonzalez is hitting the ball well at A Helena Handbaskets!
He has an AVG of .372, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Jeff Innis healing process
Jeff Innis is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
